comments:
I20050726-1222

Callers of ProgressMonitorFocusJobDialog.runAsync need to check whether the
widget(s) they use are still there.

We sometimes get the following stack trace when running one of our tests:

Tod, can you please look into this since it is causing random test failures on
our end.

It looks like the check we make for whether or not the receiver is closed before
the async also needs to happen in the async.

Dani and Dirk - is this happening consistently enough that you could verify with
a patch?

Created an attachment (id=25608)
Patch

Please try out this patch. If we are in good shape I'll release it when I hear
back.

It's not happening often. We saw it only on Linux (like in the I-build). The
test is in since last week and passed several N-builds.

You can test it yourself: simply load the jdt.ui.tests and either run all tests
(AutomatedSuite) or just the WrappingSystemTest.

As it is difficult to replicate I have released the patch - we will just have to
see if it happens again. I can't make it happen on my Windows machine and I am
having Linux trouble. I'll check again there when I get it back.
